snippet.title: Kemono Heroes - Announcement Trailer (Nintendo Switch)
snippet.description:
Find out more @ https://nisamerica.com/kemono-heroes

Blades and fur will fly in Kemono Heroes! When the Moon Good turns the inhabitants of the forest to stone, it is up to a group of ragtag heroes to fight their way to Mt. Fuji to challenge the Moon God and break his spell! 

Available Now Worldwide for Nintendo Switch (digital only).
